data.text: River cruising represents one of the fastest growing segments of tourism with a tendency of further accelerated growth. At the same time, in the midst of market competition growth, the contents, boats, organization, business philosophy and strategies of all involved in river cruises are gradually changing, and there is a need for use of the marketing concept as well as a thoughtful management of the marketing program. In recent years, riverboat operators have increased their marketing budgets multiple times, leading to increased exposure of their products to potential consumers, i.e. increased visibility of products and has indirectly influenced a sustained increase in river cruise sales.
